QuestData.Title: The Story Thus Far...
QuestData.Description: We have much to do, but first I believe a short refresher is in order.$B$BWe death knights have a colorful past with our Scarlet friends who idiotically rest comfortably in the harbor below us to the northwest.$B$BWhen you are ready for an earful, speak with me again and I shall provide enlightenment.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Lord-Commander Arete's tale at Death's Rise.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Lord-Commander Arete at Death's Rise in Icecrown.
QuestData.CompletionText: I suppose you think that you're ready to continue? How could you be though... you haven't yet heard the entirety of my tale!
QuestData.RewardText: In their folly, the Argent Crusade has chosen to turn a blind eye upon the presence of the Scarlet Onslaught. We will not.$B$BWe do not care if they might assist in the battle against the Lich King. We do not believe them worthy of existence. We will be their end, once and for all!
